CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Analogous event has also been realized in D-A type of oligomers and polymers based on 3,4bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene or 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene as donor and BT as acceptor , which demonstrated that with the depleting composition of BT unit along the conjugated backbone , the dual absorbing bands were induced to move toward the maximum absorption ( λ max ) of the all - donor homopolymer that located in between of the dual absorbance.

Let's think step by step.

1. D-A type of oligomers and polymers: These are the material type, where D represents the donor and A represents the acceptor.
2. 3,4bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene: This is a specific material or monomer used as the donor.
3. 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene: This is another specific material or monomer used as the donor.
4. BT: This is a specific material or monomer used as the acceptor.
5. Conjugated backbone: This refers to the main chain of the polymer or oligomer where the donor and acceptor units are connected.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are: D-A type of oligomers and polymers, 3,4bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene, 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene, and BT.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. 3,4bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene
2. 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene
3. BT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Analogous event has also been realized in D-A type of oligomers and polymers based on 3,4bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene or 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene as donor and BT as acceptor , which demonstrated that with the depleting composition of BT unit along the conjugated backbone , the dual absorbing bands were induced to move toward the maximum absorption ( λ max ) of the all - donor homopolymer that located in between of the dual absorbance.

Let's think step by step.

1. D-A type of oligomers and polymers: These are the type of materials being discussed in the paragraph.
2. 3,4bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene or 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene: These are specific types of donor materials used in the oligomers and polymers.
3. BT: This is the acceptor material mentioned in the paragraph.
4. Composition of BT unit: This refers to the proportion or amount of the BT acceptor units in the conjugated backbone of the oligomers or polymers.
5. Dual absorbing bands: These are the two absorption peaks or bands observed in the material.
6. Maximum absorption (λ max): This is the wavelength at which the absorption is the strongest for the all-donor homopolymer.
7. Conjugated backbone: This is the part of the material where the electrons can move freely along the chain.
8. All-donor homopolymer: This is a homopolymer where all the units are donors.

So, the property value entities in the paragraph are:

1. D-A type of oligomers and polymers
2. Composition of BT unit
3. Dual absorbing bands
4. Maximum absorption (λ max)
5. Wavelength (λ)
6. All-donor homopolymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Composition of BT unit: This refers to the proportion or amount of the BT acceptor units in the conjugated backbone of the oligomers or polymers.
2. Maximum absorption (λ max): This is the wavelength at which the absorption is the strongest for the all-donor homopolymer.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties with specific values.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Composition of BT unit along the conjugated backbone |
| Maximum absorption (λ max) of the all-donor homopolymer |
